name: Into the Wild
description:
Imagine a break from the
mundane to travel, unravel and enjoy life – observe its myriad aspects and
enjoy the little pleasures! Sit into nature’s lap for a while and amalgamate
with its treasure of flora and fauna! Take a dive into history, immersing into
the glorious past and appreciating the underlying art, culture and heritage!
Ever wondered where a solo sojourn can lead you to? Odds are, it could very
well manifest into a life changing journey of self-introspection! Not to forget
the tangible add-ons like story telling sessions, photo stories, talent
recognition and so on, and it could easily count as a one-of-a-kind memorable
experience!
